title: 21. Algorithms—Next Steps
description:
MIT 6.006 Introduction to Algorithms, Spring 2020
Instructor: Erik Demaine, Jason Ku, Justin Solomon
View the complete course: https://ocw.mit.edu/6-006S20
YouTube Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUl4u3cNGP63EdVPNLG3ToM6LaEUuStEY

In this lecture, Erik Demaine, Jason Ku, and Justin Solomon talk about their own research in algorithms. This includes origami, folding designs, and applied geometry.
